Posts.Content: Apr 28, 2008 04:51PM namaste wrote: I wish I knew if I was having surgery in April ... Found my lumps in March.  Seems like all I do is try to set up appointments and wait for results.  Having a straightforward bilateral with no reconstruction, but now they can't find an operating room until mid-May.  Now trying to find someway around this - may try out of town.  Arrgh.
